statements: UPDATE user_interaction_logs SET interaction_type='clicked' WHERE user_id=1;

UPDATE user_interaction_logs SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_time = NOW() WHERE user_id = 123 AND environment_type = 'production';

UPDATE user_devices SET registration_time = '2022-01-01 09:00:00' WHERE device_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interaction_logs SET interaction_type = 'click', interaction_data = '{"button": "submit"}' WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_time < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE user_devices SET device_type = 'mobile', registration_time = '2023-02-15' WHERE device_id = 10 OR user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_interaction_logs SET action_taken='Clicked Button' WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE SceneInteractions SET interaction_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE UserActions SET action_details = '{"description": "Updated action details"}' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND action_type = 'LOGIN';
UPDATE SceneInteractions SET interaction_type = 'VIEW' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND scene_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
